content: **this sunflower coaster crochet pattern is available to view for free online on my blog here https //hookedonpatterns com/crochet-blog/free-sunflower-coasters-crochet-pattern** the pdf download is available as the sunflower coasters & basket set ebook from my ravelry store the ebook features the full patterns for both the sunflower coasters and sunflower baskets the ebook includes extra high quality photos not available online plus a separate image-free printer friendly version invite summer into your home with this sunflower coaster crochet pattern these would brighten up your living room or make a lovely housewarming gift i have used aran/worsted weight 100% cotton yarn to make my sunflower set my finished coasters measure approximately 14cm/5 5 in diameter from tip to tip of the petals with an internal resting coaster diameter of 8cm/3 25 you will need aran/worsted weight cotton yarn in brown approx 11g/20yds per coaster and yellow 15g/30yds per coaster 4 5mm hook or size to achieve tight stitches a stitch marker yarn needle and scissors
